nodes.text: The Dai Bendu were a religious group that were the precursors of the Jedi Order. They constructed a monastery in what became Kijimi City on the planet Kijimi a thousand years before the mission to Kijimi. The existence of the temple prompted the Brotherhood of the Beatific Countenance to make a pilgrimage to Kijimi, inhabiting the Quarter of the Beatific. The first holocrons were attributed to the Dai Bendu.
The Dai Bendu were first mentioned in Star Wars canon in Unlimited Power, a 2018 roleplaying sourcebook published by Fantasy Flight Games.

In Star Wars Legends, the Dai Bendu are known as the Order of Dai Bendu and they were one of the predecessor organizations to the Je'daii Order alongside the Followers of Palawa and the Chatos Academy.
